subject: Weddings and Engagements
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer married his longtime companion, Mirka Vavrinec, in a small ceremony in his hometown, Basel, Switzerland. He announced the wedding on his Web site, saying the couple were married “surrounded by a small group of close friends and family.” They announced last month that they were expecting their first child.
